comments.body: Could you quickly explain what's the meaning of these settings?

Of course!

https://docs.codecov.io/v4.3.0/docs/commit-status

- flags: Allow us to have separate status checks for `core` and `interop`
- target: auto means that the coverage to compare to will be taken from `master`
- threshold: Percentage the coverage is allowed to drop (100 here means that CodeCov will always post a `success`, I did not want to enforce any particular number here)
Thanks! I tried and failed at finding the docs.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +7,11 @@        flags: core
        target: auto
        threshold: 100
        base: auto
    interop:
